DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , subject-masked , bilateral wear , one month dispense study compare clinical performance subject ' habitual comfilcon A sphere lens ( control ) follow refit comfilcon A asphere lens ( test ) . After dispense visit , subject return follow-up evaluation 2 week , 1 month . Both comfilcon A sphere lens ( control ) comfilcon A asphere lens ( test ) Coopervison lenses .
DOC.brief_title: One Month Dispensing Study Comparing Clinical Performance Comfilcon A Sphere Lenses Compared Comfilcon A Asphere Lenses .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is 18 34 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported eye exam last two year Is adapt comfilcon A sphere contact lens wearer Uses digital device , ( e.g . computer , tablet , smart phone , iPad ) , 4 hour day , 5 day week . Has contact lens spherical prescription 1.00 6.00 ( inclusive ) Has spectacle cylinder great 0.75D ( Diopters ) eye . Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) good eye . Can achieve distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye study contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter . Has contact lens refraction fit within available parameter study lens . Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 5 day per week , > 8 hours/day assume contraindication ) . Is willing comply visit schedule Exclusion Criteria A person exclude study he/she : Has history achieve comfortable CL ( Contact Lens ) wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Presents clinically significant anterior segment abnormality Presents ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Presents slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Significant pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GCP ) bad grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( history past year ) Seborrheic eczema eyelid region , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study . Is habitually use rewetting/ lubricate eye drop ( per day )
